body_html:
@mushroom1116 Actually, I recently started work on the gradient, and I'm almost done.

Do you need an efficient sparse CNN in TF for a project, or are you just curious?

To be clear, both my forward and back prop implementations are going to be slower than TF conv2d because I'm computing Q with simple python loops. I intend to write the Op in C++, but it's still just for a learning exercise. Support for maxpooling and strides > 1 will also be needed before it's useful.
